016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j;
017
018import java.util.Objects;
019
020public record SemanticVersion(int major, int minor, int patch) {
021
022    public static SemanticVersion from(String version) {
023        Objects.requireNonNull(version);
024        String[] parts = version.split("[.]");
025        if (parts.length != 3) {
026            throw new IllegalArgumentException("version must be compatible with \"<major>.<minor>.<patch>\"");
027        }
028        return new SemanticVersion(Integer.parseInt(parts[0]), Integer.parseInt(parts[1]), Integer.parseInt(parts[2]));
029    }
030
031    public boolean isBreakingChange(SemanticVersion previous) {
032        return major != previous.major || minor < previous.minor;
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public String toString() {
037        return String.format("%d.%d.%d", major, minor, patch);
038    }
039}
